Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Globular vase with a spherical body, tall and flared neck and a double beaded lip.  The clay is fine (Nile mud with a fine chaff temper) and has been polished. The red colour of the body has greatly worn off due to usage, whereas the black rim still bears its shine.
